Package kindred.view.cli

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Atom
    Represents an Atom of a matrix to be shown in a command-line user interface.
    CLI
    Provides a command-line user interface (CLI) to interact with the user through a terminal.
    CLITerrainParser
    Provides a method to parse a file that contains the description of Terrains in a command-line user interface.
    CLIUnitParser
    Provides a method to parse a file that contains the description of Units in a command-line user interface.
    TerminalColourHelper
    Provides methods to manage colours in a command-line interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colour
    Represents one of the possible colours in the terminal using ANSI escape sequences.
